page.title: 17WELFORD ORCHARD NURSERIES
page.content: The Nursery has 2\ acres of heated glass houses at Welford. Being part of a firm with other Nurseres in other locations. At Welford there are only spray Chrysanthemums grown all the year round as cut flowers for decoration or for the making of wreaths. The name given to these Chrysanthemums is therefore. "All the year round" or A,Y,R The A,Y,R are different from the ordinary Chrysanthemums that are grown in the garden. A,Y,R have been bred to grow in controlled conditions & flower every week of the year. Giving a continuous supply, but the Chrysanth that grows in the garden only flowers in the dark days of the year that is from approximately August to January this crop of Chrysath is given the name ( natural season ).So we see from this that the natural season plant
